Easy - unreleased track from long ago

song is an old Axel classic. I brought it back because in a few weeks we should have some pretty rocking new tunes up on this podcast, and this is a good chance to do some old/new contrasts. This was recorded in '02 in Angel's apartment in Hollywood back when I was single and lived in the same building with my two buddies.



By Krister Axel on 11/16 2009 at 23_00 in RockstarAlley
